name: KALMARS
description: This is the official plentyShop LTS plugin developed by plentymarkets. plentyShop LTS is the default template plugin for plentymarkets online stores.
author: KM

shortDescription.de: plentyShop LTS, das offizielle Onlineshop-Plugin von plentymarkets.
shortDescription.en: plentyShop LTS, the plentymarkets online shop plugin.

dataProviders.name: First item list
dataProviders.description: Display a configurable list of items in your online store

dataProviders.name: Second item list
dataProviders.description: Display a configurable list of items in your online store

dataProviders.name: Third item list
dataProviders.description: Display a configurable list of items in your online store

containers.name: Script loader: Register/load JS
containers.description: Register scripts, events and other JS related items.

containers.name: Script loader: After scripts loaded
containers.description: Load scripts, events and other JS related items, e.g. Vue components, after frameworks and scripts have been initialised.

containers.name: Page Design: After opening HTML body tag
containers.description: Add content after the opening HTML body tag.

containers.name: Page Design: After opening HTML head tag
containers.description: Add content after the opening HTML head tag.
